properties.Observatio: 4.0m long, 4.0m wide and 2.5m high water storage tank has been constructed. This tank is currently not in use. A water project can be implemented using these tank to get water of about 50 families.
properties.Descriptio: 1/2" thk 1:3 cement motar plastering to prevent leakages in liningProviding PVC pipes, pipe joints, etc.. to convey water from the springs to tank Providing PVC pipes, pipe joints, etc.. to convey water from the tanks to houses

properties.Observatio: About 250 families get drinking water informally using pipes
properties.Descriptio: Vegetative cover improving (1.5m-2.0m wide) with Areca nut seedlings @ 1.5m spacing in two rows, Beetle creeper VP @ 3m spacing in a single row, Green gram as a cover crop including applying of compost manure, NPK fertilizer and maintenanceConstruction o

Vegetative cover improving (1.5m-2.0m wide) with Areca nut seedlings @ 1.5m spacing in two rows, Beetle creeper VP @ 3m spacing in a single row, Green gram as a cover crop including applying of compost manure, NPK fertilizer and maintenance

properties.Observatio: A water project where water is pumped from a well constructed in St.Theresa lake to a water storage tank.
properties.Descriptio: Supplying, jointing and laying of PVC distribution pipe lines to extend the existing systemSupplying & installing water metersVegetative cover improving with Areca nut seedling @ 1.5m spacing in a single row, Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal

properties.Observatio: For drinking water needs of tourists visiting this place
properties.Descriptio: Drilling of 3 tube wells (5m deep) with supplying and fixing of 0.5 HP x 4" Dia tube well pump including all necessary connections and constructing a protective cell for the pump and mounting the same to good working order
